attributes.action: recognise the many heroic actions carried out by the Falkland Islanders in the war against Argentina in 1982
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today,people still talk about our achievements back in 1982. They talk about the British Forces being the best in the world. They talk about the Task Force doing a fantastic job against innumerable odds.
We now realise that without the islanders support, we may not have done so, so easily. We would have still achieved our goal but at a greater cost to servicemens lives.
We petition the government to recognise their efforts and make an award to the Islands, such as the George Cross, that was awarded to Malta during WWII.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
